Package org.ncgr.blast

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlastOutput  
    BlastOutputIterations  
    BlastOutputMbstat  
    BlastOutputParam  
    BlastReader
    A simply stub main method to run BlastUtils.readBlastXML.
    BlastUtils
    A set of static utility methods for running Blast and returning BlastOutput.
    Hit  
    HitHsps  
    Hsp  
    Iteration  
    IterationHits  
    IterationStat  
    MotifVariationSharers
    Find the set of features which each contain one of each group of motif variations.
    ObjectFactory
    This object contains factory methods for each Java content interface and Java element interface generated in the org.ncgr.blast package.
    Parameters  
    ScoreDNASequence
    Simple main routine to score a DNA sequence with BlastUtils.scoreDNASequence().
    SequenceBlaster
    Load a multi-fasta containing sequences, and search them for common motifs.
    SequenceHit
    A simple class that stores a "hit", containing a combined sequence (including N, for example), a query ID, a subject ID, the hit HSP and a score.
    SequenceHits
    A container class that stores SequenceHit instances for the same combined sequence (motif).
    Statistics
